name: get_ecommerce_order
description: Search for an e-commerce order by order ID, phone number, or email. Use this function when a customer asks about their order status, delivery, or order history. Returns order details including status, items, total, payment method, and delivery information.

search_type.description: The type of search to perform: 'order_id' for searching by order number (e.g., ORD-2025-000123), 'phone' for searching by customer phone number, 'email' for searching by customer email

search_value.description: The value to search for: the order ID, phone number, or email address depending on search_type

include_items.description: Whether to include the list of items in the order. Default is true.
